lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But he warned that protectionist sentiments could "kill the golden goose that is about to provide new profit opportunities for international traders and bankers alike that will benefit consumers by providing them with cheaper goods."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The holding company may own both a securities house and a bank, so that both services may be provided to the same customer, subject to safeguards against conflicts of interest," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It may be time to dust off the old letters of credit and to prepare for an increase in traditional export financing opportunities," Heller said.
